abstract: Even on a week when the Dow industrials took a wild roller-coaster ride, there were other stories that piqued Wall Street’s interest. We recount them in poetic form.
snippet: Even on a week when the Dow industrials took a wild roller-coaster ride, there were other stories that piqued Wall Street’s interest. We recount them in poetic form.
lead_paragraph: Even on a week when the Dow industrials took a wild roller-coaster ride, there were other stories, here on DealBook, that piqued Wall Street’s interest. As always, we recount them in poetic form:

headline.main: The Week That Was, in Verse
